item.title: Virtualization & Emulation
item.description: When developing software applications, there are tons of crazy tools. In the older days, some of those crazy tools were just impossible to think of because of the hardware and design limitations in the software world. But now, they are very common. And on some areas, are just a necessity. Of course, I am talking about virtualization and emulation. If you ever meddled with software development, you are sure to heard about them.
